item.description:

[quote=“The_Rs_Monkey, post:20, topic:3518”]Ron, Run This. I Think Its A WAY Better Paint Ron. Lol

program PaintRon; var i : integer; begin for i := 1 to 100 do begin ClickMouse(50, 50 + i, True); ClickMouse(50, 150 + i, True); ClickMouse(50 + i, 50, True); ClickMouse(50 + i, 150, True); ClickMouse(150, 50 + i, True); ClickMouse(50 + i, 150 + i, True); ClickMouse(200, 150 + i, True); ClickMouse(200 + i, 150, True); ClickMouse(200 + i, 250, True); ClickMouse(300, 150 + i, True); ClickMouse(350, 150 + i, True); ClickMouse(450, 150 + i, True); ClickMouse(350 + i, 150, True); end; end. [/quote]

program PaintRon;
var
  i : integer;
begin
for i := 1 to 100 do

 ClickMouse(50, 50 + i, True);

end;
end.

item.title: [Paint] RON!
item.dc:creator: @The_Rs_Monkey The_Rs_Monkey
item.description:
@The_Rs_Monkey wrote:

Ron, Run This. I Think Its A WAY Better Paint Ron. Lol

program PaintRon;
var
  i : integer;
begin
for i := 1 to 100 do
begin
 ClickMouse(50, 50 + i, True);
 ClickMouse(50, 150 + i, True);
 ClickMouse(50 + i, 50, True);
 ClickMouse(50 + i, 150, True);
 ClickMouse(150, 50 + i, True);
 ClickMouse(50 + i, 150 + i, True);
 ClickMouse(200, 150 + i, True);
 ClickMouse(200 +  i, 150, True);
 ClickMouse(200 + i, 250, True);
 ClickMouse(300, 150 + i, True);
 ClickMouse(350, 150 + i, True);
 ClickMouse(450, 150 + i, True);
 ClickMouse(350 + i, 150, True);
end;
end.

item.title: [Paint] RON!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Hey I was bored so I found out how to draw my name in Paint using clickmouse. Not that hard… just a little fun lol. Just copy and paste the script at the bottom and then target the entire screen. Make sure you have a big paint thing open, and click on any of the paint tools, then run the script.

Change the WaitT at the bottom to whatever number. Default is 500 (half second). Thats the speed of each click.

program RON;

Var WaitT : Integer;

Procedure R;
Begin
     ClickMouse(100, 100, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(100, 110, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(100, 120, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(100, 130, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(100, 140, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(100, 150, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(110, 100, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(120, 100, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(130, 110, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(120, 120, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(110, 120, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(120, 130, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(130, 140, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(140, 150, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
End;

Procedure O;
Begin
     ClickMouse(170, 100, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(180, 100, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(190, 100, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(200, 110, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(200, 120, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(200, 130, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(200, 140, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(190, 150, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(190, 150, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(180, 150, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(170, 150, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(160, 140, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(160, 130, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(160, 120, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(160, 110, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
End;

Procedure N;
Begin
     ClickMouse(220, 150, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(220, 140, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(220, 130, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(220, 120, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(220, 110, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(220, 100, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(230, 110, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(240, 120, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(250, 130, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(260, 140, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(270, 150, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(270, 140, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(270, 130, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(270, 120, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(270, 110, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
     ClickMouse(270, 100, true);
     Wait(WaitT);
End;

Begin
     WaitT := 500;
     R;
     O;
     N;
End.

~Ron

Read full topic
